com.fluidops.iwb.api
Interface MonitoringServiceImplMBean

All Known Subinterfaces:
MonitoringService
All Known Implementing Classes:
MonitoringServiceImpl, MonitoringServiceRemote
public interface MonitoringServiceImplMBean

The interface for Monitoring Information Workbench information. This interface explicitly uses the MBean naming conventions to allow for JMX support. See MonitoringService for usage documentation.

Author:
as

Method Summary
 int getActiveThreads()
          Get the number of active threads.
 int getActiveUserCount()
          Get the number of active user sessions, i.e. the number of active http browser sessions.
 java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getActiveUsers()
          Get the set of active logged-in users, i.e. users that are logged in to the system.

getActiveUsers

@Doc(value="Returns the set of logged-in users")
java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getActiveUsers()
                                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Get the set of active logged-in users, i.e. users that are logged in to the system. Note that this method implements set semantics meaning that two different sessions with the same login credentials are treated as one user.

Returns:
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
